answers.answer: You need to make sure u control the diabetes and do what you can to keep the other eye healthy.  If you don't have any vision left in the involved eye (can't see light), you can ask the above soc to order you some atropine and steroid drops ( both very cheap) to see if that helps with the pain.  Otherwise, find your county hospital and see if their is an ophthalmology clinic there.  They would be able to treat you for a minimal fee.HV
